Run T.A.R.D.I.S.

runTardis.Rd

Launches the GUI of T.A.R.D.I.S. that allows to input all parameters in an intuitive way to perform targeted peak detection.

Usage

runTardis()

Developed by Pablo Vangeenderhuysen.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.3.
